title: Pumpkin sultana scones
ingredients: ['250g plain flour', '240g wholemeal flour', '4 teaspoons baking powder', '1 1/4 teaspoons bicarbonate of soda', '1/2 teaspoon ground ginger', '1/2 teaspoon allspice', '3 teaspoons ground cinnamon', '1/4 teaspoon ground cloves', '1 teaspoon salt', '4 tablespoons butter, softened', '8 tablespoons apple sauce', '400g sugar', '2 eggs, beaten', '400g pumpkin puree', '125g finely chopped pecans', '325g sultanas', '3 tablespoons sugar', '2 teaspoons ground cinnamon']
